global.flavor_text: <1>Keep Helper Handy.</1> <10>Hamburger Help me!</10> <11>Talk to the Hand!</11> <12>Did you know I have a mixtape? Watch the Stove!</12> <13>Sometimes, I wish I could just reach out and touch the stars... but then I remember I'm stuck in the kitchen, surrounded by ground beef and pasta.</13> <14>I'm just a humble glove, but when I get involved, it's a game changer.</14> <15>I've got the perfect recipe... but I wonder... can I start a trend? #LeftyKnowsBest.</15> <16>Who knew being a lefty could make dinner so right?</16> <17>Sure, I'm just a hand. But when you've got Hamburger Helper, you've got the whole meal in your hands</17> <18>Some people need a recipe book... Me? I've got Hamburger Helper. Simple, no fuss, just tasty.</18> <19>When life gives you ground beef, make magic. No questions asked.</19> <2>WHAT'S. FOR. DINNER?</2> <20>Gravy is just a sauce that graduated with honors.</20> <21>If you sear a steak, it locks in the juices. But if you sear your hand, it locks in the regret.</21> <22>Bacon gets all the love, but let's be real - burger grease is the true flavor MVP.</22> <23>If you grill a burger, it's fancy. If you fry it, it's fast food. If you microwave it... well, let's not talk about that.</23> <24>Smoke-flavored beef is considered gourmet. Smoke-flavored kitchen means I messed up.</24> <25>If pasta is made from wheat, and bread is made from wheat... is lasagna just a noodle sandwich?</25> <26>Lasagna is just pasta cake. And I'm okay with that.</26> <27>If pasta is Italian, and mac and cheese is American... what country gets credit for SpaghettiOs?</27> <3>I can Help!</3> <4>Hamburger Helper, when you need a Helping Hand!</4> <5>Hamburger Helper can help you turn just one pound of hamburger into a delicious hearty dish!</5> <6>In a snap!</6> <7>One pound! One pan! One tasty meal!</7> <8>Yahoo!</8> <9>Hamburger Helper only works if the hamburger is ready to accept that it needs help.</9>
global.food_wears_off: Looks like you're hungry again. We can fix that in a snap!

global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: Guess what? You are now the alliance leader! That makes you the main ingredient in this operation - I'll be your Helper!
global.you_are_now_party_leader: Congrats! You are now the party leader. That means it's your turn to mix it up and keep everything from sticking to the pan!
global.you_joined_alliance: Look at that - you've joined an alliance! Just like a good meal, everything's better when we come together!
global.you_joined_party: Welcome aboard! You've joined a party. Now let's get cookin' - no one likes a cold skillet!

global.your_party_joined_alliance: Your party just joined an alliance! That's what I call a complete meal - one helping just wasn't enough!
global.your_party_left_alliance: Your party just left the alliance. Back to small-batch cooking, huh? Respect.
